channel.title: New Dragon Claws Animation
channel.description: So, I'm using a pretty clean basic 317 PI source and client, and I added dragon claws. The source doesn't have the anim for the legit dragon claw special, only the ugly old one. How would I go upon adding the animation for the real dragon claw special attack, if possible? I have no experience with this and have never tried it. I searched around and couldn't find anything.

item.title: New Dragon Claws Animation
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

So, I’m using a pretty clean basic 317 PI source and client, and I added dragon claws. The source doesn’t have the anim for the legit dragon claw special, only the ugly old one. How would I go upon adding the animation for the real dragon claw special attack, if possible? I have no experience with this and have never tried it. I searched around and couldn’t find anything.

Read full topic
